official_title: A bill to revoke the recent increase in rates of pay for Members of Congress under the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Revokes the pay increase for Members of Congress transmitted by the President on January 17, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to revoke the recent increase in rates of pay for Members of Congress under the Federal Salary Act of 1967.
